title: Biochemistry Lab I
description: Modern biochemical techniques including methods for protein, nucleic acid, and lipid isolation and characterization; enzyme assays; chromatography; electrophoresis; and use of databases.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 3211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3216 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CHEM 4511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3521 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
